desc: Hello, I am looking for a freelancer to work on a 3D animation project for me. It's a 2-minute explanatory animation video in which you need to work on.JOB:You will be provided with a basic storyboard. And all the details regarding the project before moving to animation phase. I have also sent the link to a random youtube video for your reference (I expect better quality than this video). The animation may include basic character animation as well (but will be greyed out and made partially transparent so it won't look weird or out of place.[url removed, login to view]ANIMATION:Animation includes animation of basic characters putting stuff on the conveyer belt and the process of separation and disposal at garbage facility near the airport. Animation duration may range from 1-2 minute range depending on Script. You will be provided with Script, Storyboard, Any necessary references and Voiceover. You must provide all the files after the animation is done and I will need the render in Full HD 1920X1080 30fps Png Seq format. I have attested basic flowchart of garbage disposal.ANIMATOR:Only people who can deliver the project in time and are confident enough apply.Provide me links for your previous works so I get an idea of your skill and quality. you should have knowledge in modelling, animation and most importantly in Lighting.*NOTE: I am not looking for Expensive High Budget Animator**Agencies Please do not apply*I have a low budget and I will grant the project to the animator who will fit my profile, Please make sure you provide me detailed budget for this animation.  If everything goes well I will be looking to work with you on future projects as well.Thank you for all the applicants in advance. Looking forward to see your amazing works. Blow my mind.

desc: I need video samples of people walking into a scene. These are to be used for testing and marketing purposes. This is easy money. You don't need any special skills.I would like to start with 10 videos. I will award to 10 Freelancers. This is a micro-project. Please limit your bid to under the maximum project - $30. This work only takes minutes to complete.These videos are to be used with image processing software. I will use the video for testing and marketing.If applying for this micro-project, tell me about the person you plan to record. Make sure they are willing to be recorded and used for testing or marketing.I will release the payment after receiving the video and media release. If the video has major problems, I'll ask you to record again. I have a high reputation on Freelancer. If you deliver, you will get paid.Requirements:1. Use your smart phone to record a person walking into any scene. This can be indoors or outdoors. Hold the camera very steady. The person must be between the age of 18 to 30 years, man or woman. You can record at any resolution. Most smart phones are set to high definition. Don't record in a dark room, give enough light. Keep the recording length to under 20 seconds. Have the person do something funny, like tell joke or do a dance. Make sure they speak in English.2. The person being recorded must sign a media release. This allows me to use the video for testing and marketing purposes. See attached media release.Good luck,Brian
title: Video Samples of People -- 2

desc: We are looking a professional that has experience using Kubernetes to create a tutorial for new users. The majority of the tutorial should be screencast capture and narration describing what you are doing on the screen and Slides. Face time is completely optional.Some Kubernetes tutorial examples can be found here:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]I will provide a full curriculum of this Kubernetes tutorial and detailed instructions about what should be covered in each lecture.Your responsibility is:1. Prepare the code examples needed for this tutorial. (I will provide detailed guidance)2. Prepare slides needed for each lecture. (I will provide detailed guidance about the content of the slides and template of the slides)3. Record all video lectures according to my curriculum.4. Either use your voice in the videos or you provide captions and I will produce the voiceover separately.Besides the one-time commission, if you interested in answering student question, after the course is launched, you would get 10% revenue share from this tutorial sale(This revenue is ongoing). And the responsibility of you is to answer the student's questions about this course.Requirement:1. Hands-on experience with Kubernetes is required and good understanding about the usage of Kubernetes.2. Previous experience with Camtasia video editing is required.
title: Create a 4 hour Kubernetes video tutorial for users

desc: Our children's nursery is seeking a professional to manage the nursery’s social media network pages. The applicant has to be located in Doha (Qatar) and will attend meetings once or twice a month with the nursery management. It is preferable that the candidate is female. The duration of work is few hours per week and can be done remotely. This is an ongoing project.This role will involve the following responsibilities:-To generate, edit, and publish  content, including text, images, videos or HTML, on all of the nursery’s social media pages (currently Facebook and Instagram), and in a way that is engaging to the members of these pages and builds meaningful connections;-Create engaging and creative videos for the nursery that can be published on its social media pages (content will be provided to you);-Explore ways to optimize the nursery’ social media content and pages to ensure maximum engagement and interaction from members and;-Suggest and implement improvements to increase the visibility of the nursery through its social media networks.Skills required:Excellent writing skills in English. Arabic is very desirable.Knowledge in managing social media pages.Knowledge in producing creative videos for the nursery’s social pages’ content.
title: Social Media Specialist (based in Qatar)
